storyInfo: Exusiai, having finished a day's work, finds an unexpected letter upon returning home.

attributes.content: Pop! Pop! Pop!
Bangbang! Pop!
Dadadada! Ba-bang!
Pewpewpew! Bangbang!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: One enemy left, exactly one rubber bullet left. No waste, no pollution, all emergency conserved, it's great for the environment. Whaddya think?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What a persistent fella, chasing me down three blocks and whatnot. I already told you, I don't have the goods.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You bitch! What are you going on about the environment for? You tryna mess with me?!
attributes.name: Local Ruffian

attributes.content: Took you that long to figure out? What else was I to do? Taking out the lot of you would've been super boring.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Anyway, I guess that's game over. So like, would you care to say any last words? Speak now or forever hold your peace~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Stay back! Get away from me!
attributes.name: Local Ruffian

attributes.content: Bang! You're dead!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Guh... Urgh...
attributes.name: Local Ruffian

attributes.content: —Bullseye!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Look at that impeccable aim. Good job, me! Heh, guess I'll treat myself to an extra slice of apple pie today!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Next up... back to work!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hmm, today's last address, Center Street No. 12-7, Ah Choi Restaurant...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Woah, I'm sorry, did I just bump into you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: Ah Choi Restaurant is that way. Totally opposite direction.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: Ah, you're right... Thanks a bunch, mister.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't mention it. It's not every day I meet a fellow countryman.
attributes.name: Passerby

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (A Laterano? A Messenger, by the looks of things...)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Messages, huh...)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (It'd probably be a good idea to write home before Sauin.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We should have some stationery back at the base... Hm, guess I should pick up some souvenirs to send over with the letter.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, gotta finish work first... Now where is it, Ah Choi Restaurant...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: All right, here it is.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Excuse me. Anyone? Penguin Logistics home delivery—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Who is it...? Woah! What happened here? What's that on the ground... is he d-dead?!
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Hehe, it's no big deal. Don't freak out over every little corpse!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics is offering a special smashed, bloody street sale! Act fast within the next three days and get our deliveries half off! Anyway, these are the goods you ordered, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Express delivery?
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Wait, I don't think this is right.
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I did order something, but it's only been a few hours since I placed the order. There's no way it could've come this fast...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: And that's where you're wrong. You said it's been a few hours, so getting it now sounds just about right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: After all, speed is the lifeblood of the logistics industry!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Amplifiers, lanterns, and flower baskets. Woah, are you opening a new store?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Um, yeah...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Wow, good luck! Anyway, all your stuff's right here. What's the matter, something wrong?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I must say, this is exactly what I ordered...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Are you for real?
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Real as the wings on my back. Intracity deliveries are a piece of cake. Would've gotten here even faster if not for those troublesome fellas lying over there on the road...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: All righty, don't worry about it, okay? If you're good to go, please sign right here!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh... Here, and here...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Very good. That's another job well done!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Bye bye then! Remember to leave me a good review!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hey, hold on...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Ungh... ugh...
attributes.name: Local Ruffian

attributes.content: Good grief... Girls these days...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: At least clean up the 'trash' you brought with you before you leave...
attributes.name: Ordinary Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Aaaand, that finishes up the last item!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: With that, another day of work comes to a close.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yo–– Texas, Croissant, the two of you done with work yet?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No issues here. Everything got delivered.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Got mah hands on the Baws's thing over on my end!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Some fellers tried to swipe the stuff, but I took care of 'em real good. What's so interestin' about an ol' box anyway? Ain't got a clue as to what's inside...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Maybe it's something dangerous. Either way, it's our responsibility to get rid of anyone trying to drag us down, no matter what.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Anyway, that's that. Time to head home!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Stop... right there...
attributes.name: Local Ruffian

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Exusiai, you were in charge over here, right? Why's this guy still able to talk?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You can't use live rounds in residential areas.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: These guys don't exactly look like gangsters either. If I don't follow the rules, things'll get pretty messy for us.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Besides, we're here to help rebuild the neighborhood and we were told not to cause any trouble. I made specially sure to avoid any vitals.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I suppose so.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Give them a lifeline, and the people here should be able to seize the opportunity and pull themselves out. Should be fine.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The last time Exusiai was able to use live rounds was when she was pickin' up that Rhodes Islander, right?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Them was some wild days! Baws sure does seem sweet on that thar Rhodes Island. I reckon we got a long 'n fruitful relationship ahead of us.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sounds about right. They've got some pretty interesting folks over there, so it's no surprise the Boss has taken a liking to them.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Enough to cause trouble.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hehe, isn't that the Boss's favorite?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You'n say that again!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But gettin' sent overseas to work sure sounds like a pain in the tail.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's pretty much the same thing we do, isn't it? Just with some extra mileage.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The salary and overtime pay there are pretty darn good too. Throw on whatever the Boss gives us over here, and it's like having twice the moolah!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No foolin'? double?! Looks like this li'l lady's about to be laughin all the way to the bank!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I wanna go, too! Exusiai, bring me along next time!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Haha, I knew that's what you'd say.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ah, crap, how'd it get this late already?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: C'mon, Texas, pick up the pace. We gotta hurry back to base before it's too late!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Get in the car. Hang on tight.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Waaaaait, hold on a sec! Okay, I'm ready! Step on it!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Where's the fire, anyway? Hey, Texas, ain't you gonna ask why she's in such a hurry?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: There's no way it's anything that matters.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh, good point.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hey, don't talk about me like I'm not here! And I'll have you know, it's super important!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If we don't get back soon, the apple pie I put in the oven's gonna burn!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: How in tarnation is that important? Woooooooahh! Texas, how fast you cornerin'——?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Too slow!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I had time to enjoy three LPs, both sides. Is it your legs, or your brain? How'd a couple of simple deliveries take that long?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Phew, thank goodness, the apple pie is safe!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Mmmmh, that's the aroma I could die for! The heat's just right too, absolutely perfect!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yo! Listen to me when I'm talkin' to you!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Baws, we was floorin' it to get back here.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Lucky fer us, we didn't bump into any cops. Last thing you want's a ticket poppin' up on the doormat. That'd be a month of Texas's take-home down the drain.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: In other words! Texas put her own salary on the line to rush back over here, so don't blame her, Boss.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas, what'cha got?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You gonna let the girls leave you their messes to clean up like that?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's whatever.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ugh. Lame.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Because I'm so magnanimous, I won't make a fuss over y'all being slower than a bad dump. Now, where's my stuff?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Right here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Now we're talkin'! Yo Exu, I need my chair and those fancy electric specs!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Coming right up, Boss!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What'd you get this time? Huh... This box is pretty heavy. Some kind of machinery?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh! I think that logo and the controller shape's givin' me a clue...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's gotta be the thingy majigger what's all sold outta the markets... some last-generation vidja games console? I heard some rich folks have been buyin' 'em up, top dollar.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Heh, games. Who's to say that life ain't just one big game?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Texas, hook it up.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: This line here?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Woah, we got a picture!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hrmm, oh? Looks like a side-scrolling racing game... direction keys, accelerator...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And then, what's this button here? Is this supposed to be a bomb?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: T'ain't no bomb. Looks a bit more like...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: An Originium rocket launcher.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I knew it!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Wait a minute, ain't this one of them games, the kind where you dodge obstacles and whatnot 'til you get to the end? Why'd they put in a Originium rocket launcher...?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You damned fool! Like hiding and dodging is the only way to reach the end?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I get it now, you can just charge forward in a straight line and send anything in your way packing! Now that's the kind of game I like, nice and simple rules.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Looks like the controls are working just fine. And I think it's even got a two-player mode!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Say, Boss, wanna give it a shot?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You challengin' me to a match? What's the fun in playin' a game you know you'll win?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Texas, you're up.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Great, I got full ammo. Watch this!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You went and blew up all them buildings in yer way. Sounds about right fer you, actually...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hahaha! What's wrong with taking down a building or two? I'm gonna win this round for sure!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...You're wide open!
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: (Fires an explosive at the opposite lane)
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: They let'cha shoot at the other player's lane?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Nobody said you can't.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Indeed, nobody said you can't. But if you're gonna pull that trick on me, don't blame me for what happens next...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: As they say, an eye for an eye! What goes around, comes around! Dodge this if you can, I'm gonna blow you away!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Wh-What the heck, you'n just go and shoot the other car too?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Nobody said you can't, right? Hehe, I'm going for the gold, baby!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hm? Somebody at the door.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Good afternoon, everyone.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What are you playing? All the yelling and screaming spooked me at the door.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Well, if it ain't Sora! C'mon in, take a seat. Exusiai and Texas're playin' vidja games. Baws got his flippers on an old game console, and he's lettin' us have first go at it.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Wanna play?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Video games? I think I'll pass, I'm no good at those.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, I grabbed the mail on my way in. Are you sure you can keep this up? There's a whole mountain of bills this month...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And one more thing... here, there's something for you, Exusiai.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Mail, for me? Wonder if it's a bill, or a challenge.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ehh, I'm sure it's not the diploma that the school was supposed to reissue, right...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Whassat? You never got yer graduation diploma?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Of course I got it!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: It's just, uh, the last time I got in a fight with the gang, I accidentally burnt it all along with the fake bank notes and the fake diploma the Boss made us.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I even reminded you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Did you now? Sorry, I don't seem to remember that at all!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That does sound like something you'd do.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But this letter looks like a pretty ordinary, personal letter. It probably isn't any of the things you just listed off...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hard to say.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hey, Croissant, here's the controller. Take my spot for a bit.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Can do!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hmm, let's take a look.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Huh, it's from my sister..
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, I did run into a Laterano Messenger earlier today.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Woah, if she wrote this whole thick stack of stuff, she must really be worried sick...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai's sister?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wait, hold on a second, why do I seem to recall that your sister was in some kind of accident...? Isn't that why you came all the way to Lungmen looking for Mostima?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hm? That sounds right to me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My sister was in an accident a number of years back, and ended up in a deep coma, in the hospital for a long time...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But, she had already woken up by the time I left Laterano!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh? What's wrong, Sora? Why do you look like you just saw the Boss gyrating while singing some sappy love song?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Where'd you get that overly specific example from anyway? My eyes already hurt just thinking about it!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Uhh... nothing, don't mind me. It's just, I sometimes feel stupid for genuinely worrying about you...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Ah, lemme guess... You didn't happen to misunderstand something before, did you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Uh...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Huh, really? You serious?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Though my sister did have some pretty severe injuries, she's been gradually recovering. Otherwise, how could I just ditch her and run around the world?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You do have a point.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well, I can't blame you for misunderstanding. After all, things did look pretty dicey back then.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: And I thought someone like her never could've gotten hurt like that. But there she was, her bloodied, unconscious body...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: B-Bloody?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah, things got way crazier that time than what we normally get into.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I always thought I was a pretty brave girl, but I clearly remember being scared into a cold sweat. Just thinking about it now still makes my hands shake.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Not even kidding. At the time, I hadn't sorted things through in my head, and I nearly jumped into a fight with the one who brought my sister back.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I can imagine...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But, that person you just mentioned... was that Mostima?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Bingo, the very same. After bringing my sister back, she immediately disappeared to Lord-knows-where.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Even after my sister regained consciousness, she wouldn't tell me what happened...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: How could I go on without knowing the whole story?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: So basically, I just wanted to find out what happened. I chased Mostima all the way from Laterano to Lungmen, and that's when I met the Boss.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Um, how do I put it... So it's like...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That whole thing with you joining up, plus the fact that you always try to cut the conversation short every time Mostima's name comes up, I just assumed you had some bad blood with her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If we're talking about how Mostima always dragged my sister into working overtime, and how many times that ended with me getting stood up, then yeah, we do have some bad blood.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh? You knew each other as kids?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hmm... Darn it, I can't paint a mental picture of your sister at all.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Just the thought of there being another person like you is already giving me a headache.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Haha, don't you worry about that. She and I are very different.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah. After all, we don't share any blood.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hwuh?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No foolin'?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Of course... Wait, Croissant, how come you're listening in?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You ain't never talked about yer past. I'm so curious I just can't help mahself...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I don't talk about my past?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, let's save the story for later! Don't get distracted. Just keep gaming!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: —Too late.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I win.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ahhhh! Texas! That's darn underhanded to pass me up like that!!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ugh... Total defeat.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Everyone sure is curious.)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (But, did I really never bring up the thing with my sister before?)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Well, I guess it's not altogether surprising, since nobody bothered asking...)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Speaking of Mostima, I've been waiting for eons now and she still hasn't shown up. Is the Boss trying to pull a fast one on me?)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Whatever, I'll just have to go with the flow! First, gotta write a response though...)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hm, wonder if we have any snacks that won't go bad or break...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, Exusiai, where are you going? Not going to play anymore?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Right, you guys have fun. I'm going to go shopping for some nice gifts. Be right back~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We'll have a rematch later tonight, Texas! That round just now didn't count, so let's have a redo!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Hehe, just you wait! I'm gonna win for sure!
attributes.name: Exusiai
